updates.title: design/leader: GentleForces’ Danni Mohammed
updates.description: Danni Mohammed is founder and CEO of GentleForces. The London-based strategy and design studio works with clients like adidas, Jack Wolfskin and Weekday. Design What would your monograph be called? Chaos and order: Why it’s normal and how to embrace it. What recent design work made you a bit jealous? I am breaking the rules. […]What to read next: design/leader: Hyperfocus’ Paul Watmough-Halim | design/leader: Studio North’s Holly Gleave | design/leader: Zebra’s Lee
